page.title: 02COMMUNICATIONS COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: {British Telecom}employing 1500 people including 90 operators controls telephone links.About 6500 calls are connected daily & over 228000 are dialled direct. About 250 are emergency calls.Most private homes have a telephone either with a dial or push button numbers.{The Post Office provides postal deliveries twice a day.Three delivery drivers deliver parcels once daily. There are 24 post persons who travel on foot or bus. Pillar boxes outside post offices & on street corners are emptied 3 times a day.Postal codes make sorting easy & quick. At{Mercia Sound}radio station several presenters provide round-the- clock entertainment & news with an estimated audience of 62% of the population.
